All Classes

Class Description
AllPublicFiles
This class calls GetFileFromJSON.getFile() and GetFileFromJSON.getFile(java.nio.file.Path) to get all the public files from a Dropbox account (directly shared or indirectly accessible files)
Controller
This class is the controller of the possible routes for the server
EsameOopApplication  
EsameOopApplicationTests  
ExceptionHandlerClass
This class handles the exception using SpringBoot
FileType
This class is a model to represent the type of shared files in a Dropbox account, and their quantity
Filter
This class is the superclass from which every filter inherits
FilterBodyTest
Testing class to check if a body-exception has been thrown correctly
FilterExtension
This class is the implementation of Filter for the filter on file's extension
FilterLink
This class is the implementation of Filter for the filter on the presence of a shared link
FilterManager
This class manages all the filters that can be used for the data and the stats.
FilterName
This class is the implementation of Filter for the filter on folder's name
FilterParametersTest
Testing class to check if a parameter-exception has been thrown correctly
FilterSizeGreater
This class is the implementation of Filter for the filter on file's size (greater)
FilterSizeLess
This class is the implementation of Filter for the filter on file's size (less)
GetFileFromJSON
This class parses the JSONObject into an ArrayList of files
GetJSONFromURL
This class opens a connection with the chosen api, reading and copying the response json in a String which gets parsed in the form of a JSONObject
IllegalBodyException
Exception thrown if the filter body is not correct
IllegalParameterException
Exception thrown if the filter has incorrect parameters
SharedFile
Model of a shared link of Dropbox
StatsOnSubFolder
This class calculates the statistic based on the number of shared links per sub-folder in an ArrayList of SharedFile.
StatsOnType
This class calculates the statistic based on the type of files with a shared link in an ArrayList of SharedFile.
